title: Keycloak 26.2.2 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Make distribution startup timeout configurable testsuite   BUGS   * [Keycloak CI] - FIPS UT - Run crypto tests ci  * CVE-2025-3910 Two factor authentication bypass  * CVE-2025-3501 Keycloak hostname verification
